info.task: read information about a switch in the on state
info.title: Read information about a switch in the on state in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Notifications' switch, and sets its state to 'on'

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, read information about the switch.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, read information about the switch.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
